April 16, 1906 D Elsecar Contest
Elsecar Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
elsecar-contest
None
L'Etoile du Nord [arr. Godfrey]
Elsecar, South Yorkshire 1st prize £7, 2nd prize £4, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. divided between Parkgate and Rockingham Colliery. March contest 1st (£1) Houghton Main Colliery, 2nd (10s.) Rotherham Borough. 8 bands competed.
Feb. 21, 2012, 4:16 p.m. Sept. 13, 2018, 10:07 a.m.
1 Rotherham Borough Charles John Elsom
2 Houghton Main Colliery William Heap
3 Thurlstone Brass Band William Heap
4 Parkgate Temperance John Ellis Dyson
4 Rockingham Band Joseph Boothroyd
